Comment: Bought another projector for my husband for Christmas, but this one was recommended on CBS Sunday Morning and we decided to give it a try. MUCH EASIER TO USE than the other one. We sent that one back and are looking forward to many evenings on our deck under the stars with a movie.

Title: Great Portable Projector
Comment: This thing is awesome!  The sound is loud enough for a roomful of people to hear and it throws a massive picture.  We tested it in a room that has blackout shades, and it was a little hard to see because of the cracks of light coming through (but still watchable). Once it was dark outside this thing was amazing.  The resident Android OS and ability to download Netflix, Amazon Video, etc. is also pretty cool.  Can't wait to bust this out while camping!

Title: Absolutely a great purchase!
Comment: I love the build of this product and it's mobility, nothing like taking an instant movie screen everywhere you go. I had issues connecting to the app and then I emailed the company and they were very helpful and responsive and now it works like a charm. My Hulu fails to operate on it, but I'm sure they will be coming up with a patch to fix it soon :-)

Title: Great, compact, and easy to use!
Comment: This projector has good sound quality for it's size, and the picture quality is great too! We did purchase a tripod to help steady it in most situations, but overall super happy with this product! It's actually the second one we bought. Our son who is away at college uses it for dates and groups outdoors and he can control it all through his phone which is great. We've used it on vacation, as well as around the house...good to use with Netflix to watch movies or shows anywhere!

Title: Great quality, picture, and sound. LOVE!!!!
Comment: Absolutely love. Very easy to use. Great quality picture and sound. So easy to set up. Can connect to apps. You can project from computer and even mirror your phone. So handy. We use it for homeschool as well. Well worth the money for such a well made handy gadget.

Title: Great for travel but has draw backs
Comment: Great little project but I do have a few issues with it. Brightness isn’t the best, you really need to be in a very very dark environment to use for movies. Remote that is provide works but in order to use apps such as Prime Video, you need to download the Nebula App and use the remote on there, which can be an annoyance.

Title: Exactly What I Wanted
Comment: This is the perfect travel projector. It is exactly what I expected and wanted. I have the ViewSonic M1 as well which is an amazing projector. I use the ViewSonic in my room as my television. The Nebula is my go to for a take anywhere media device. Today I hooked up the Sega Genesis Mini and now it will be my portable party arcade. I am very happy with this purchase.

Title: Awesome little projector!
Comment: This is really nice. We use it as a ceiling projector while laying in bed. The apps work well and the remote is fine. We mostly use the iPhone app to control it.

Title: Clear picture, great sound, and 10/10 Nebula customer support.
Comment: The Capsule is the BEST and worth the money. I bought the Capsule in February and it has worked flawlessly - whether I’m watching Netflix or Hulu from the device, using the HDMI, or using it as a speaker. The one time I had trouble connecting my phone with the Connect app, Nebula support went out of their way to help me fix it. (If you’re having issues and haven’t contacted them, I highly recommend doing so).The picture quality is great, but like any projector it looks best and is easiest to see in low light.We’ve been loving social distance movie nights outdoors, made possible by this projector! Can’t wait to take it camping soon.

Title: Well built device and great customer support
Comment: Normally I don't write a product review unless it's a very bad or very good product, which Nebula Capsule turns out to be a great purchase. The device is well built and feels solid right out of the box. Easy to setup and user interface is very friendly. I use android, IOS and Mac OS to screen mirror with no issue. The sound quality is also great which surprises me due to its size. The main drawback is the picture quality which I believe is somewhat around 480P to 720P depending on what size you use to project, but it's still good enough to watch just don't expect it's a HD quality. I read in the other review that this device can unlock its full potential with google play store installed which required a special code from customer support so I did contact customer support and ask for the code. Turning out their customer support is also amazing. Adam helped me with the code and provide detail information on how to use it less then 5 mins. Have to give thumb up for such great customer service considering most big company doesn't even have great CS support. Overall device itself deserve 4/5 stars and customer service pumps the overall experience to 5 stars.

Title: Great product. With great support.
Comment: Purchased this for a take anywhere smart entertainment solution and I am very happy with it. It has an easy to follow user interface that had most of the go to entertainment apps up and running quickly.One thing to mention is you may find some apps by the search function if you don't see them on the AptiodTV tile menu.It Worked well with WiFi and mobile device with verizon as a hot spot for streaming.  The projector controller app to use phone as remote control is a nice addition but takes some practice. I can confirm that it is possible to update with firmware to run Google play if you need it and are willing to do some research. Service for this projector, as with all Anker products is second to none.

Title: Works great. Once  you figure out a couple of things
Comment: Please work with customer service to update the software. It will add access to all the apps you could want. Technical support was extremely helpful and prompt. Also,If you have an Apple device buy the Apple HDMI adapter to connect. Buying a cheaper off brand will not work!!

Title: Fantastic for the Nintendo Switch! Fantastic for Plex!
Comment: I regularly watch Plex media on this with the kids in the living room Plex app works great!Works great as a projector for the Nintendo Switch - made a fun game night with my kids.I spoke with Kevin from Nebula support who answered a bunch of questions I had on features and feedback for the Capsule! GREAT PRODUCT! GREAT COMPANY! :) (Nebula an Anker Brand).

Title: The product is better than expected
Comment: The product is better than expected. At night the picture is clear and bright. The support is terrific. I had two issues, one with price and another with documentation (see below). Kevin and John on the support team resolved each quickly and professionally.A couple of recommendations for prospective buyers: 1. You need to take the battery cover *off* of the remote to remove the battery keeper plastic tab, not just pull it out like every other electronic item I have ever bought. 2. You have to point the remote *directly* at the unit, otherwise it is unresponsive. (And resist the human temptation to point the remote at the "screen" like it was a TV.)

Title: This can quickly become on of your favorite technical tools or toys...
Comment: I do a lot of 3D animation and graphic design stuff as a hobby -- I wanted something more portable and battery cable than any of the DLP projectors I owned for projecting -- this product owns up to the hype.  I was tossed between the lower and higher version of the Nebula, but after receiving this, I think the choice I made was good.  We often project onto a 120" screen, the garage for football games, and fun "family movie nights".

Title: Love this thing
Comment: I love this thing. That is all buy it, sit outside, get a white sheet or projector screen enjoy being a kid watching movies or whatever where ever. I got a cheap ROKU because the built in app is fine but doesn’t do enough.

Title: Fun for large screen home movies in the dark. Works during the day smaller screen.
Bright, portable, easy to use
Comment: We used our first purchase of this projector to show some home movies -- easy to set up, bright enough for a whole wall, made for a good evening's show. We just bought a second one for use in making slide presentations from computer to screen. No real problems with the remote control, but navigation could be easier.

Title: Great project and Amazing customer service
Comment: It’s been almost a year to have this project and I am so happy to have this. I love the quality and how easy to install and play but there were one problem I need to get help. I couldn’t down load the google apps so I sent an email to customer center. They quickly send me an email with the solution also follow up how my problem is solved . I was so impressed their dedicated service. Super reliable product and amazing service.

Title: Exceeded expectations
Comment: This thing is awesome. Small but packs a lot of punch. Picture was great, sound was great, and super easy to use. Super small and easy to travel with.  I’m not at home and have spotty WiFi so I brought an hdmi cord and a few adapters and can hook up my iPad, iPhone, and portable hardrive all directly into it. When I get home I plan on using it in my yard when I grill out or want to watch a game and it’s too nice outside. Really couldn’t recommend more. Excellent purchase, and worth the money.

Title: Great Alternative Purchase
Comment: So after getting this setup and figuring out that I cannot “mirror” copyright stuff from my phone, I am very pleased with sound and picture quality and the size of the picture is just right. The app is (as with the You Tube videos I watched) it’s not very useful on my iPhone it take awhile to respond.

Title: It does exactly what it says on the tin. Good support.
Comment: Nice compact projector with decent picture quality for its size. (It's literally the size of a soda can!) Supports many android apps albeit not always perfect. I needed some help getting certain apps set up and customer support was helpful in providing the necessary information.I bought a cheap projector fabric to pin to my wall and a cheap Amazon Basics camera tripod to hold the Capsule, allowing me to create a nice theater set-up in my bedroom.It's awesome for situations where you can be in a completely dark room.  But it does struggle when there is light, so I wish it had a bit more lumens. The sound could be better but it allows you to pair other bluetooth speakers. I hear the next version of the Capsule is said to have increased brightness and sound quality so I'll definitely be keeping an eye out in the future.

Title: Great for the price and size!
Comment: I absolutely love this projector. It's small. Has a decent picture for my big wall, and I can't wait to take it on trips/do some outside movies. The speaker on it has some pretty good sound too!😁👍 I like being able to use the phone as a remote/mouse. My only complaint is that it turns off occasionally--maybe it's a built in setting to not burn out the light?🤷‍♀️

Title: Best thing I've ever purchased
Comment: Been using for a couple years now and continues to price to be the single best purchase and most versatile thing I've ever owned. Portable entertainment absolutely wherever and whenever

Title: A good product
Comment: At first i had some trouble understanding how to use the nebula capsule but after reaching out to customer support I was able to fully understand and operate the projector. (Kayla was extremely helpful as he was very kind and patient with me as i asked my many ignorant questions.) The sound quality is good for what it is and the brightness is very good. There is a soft fan noise inside the nebula capsule that some people might find annoying. I personally don't mind it because when you're watching a video you really can't hear it at all. Overall I am very happy with my new nebula capsule.(Kayla if you are reading this thanks again for all of your help!!!)

Title: Super easy portable projector
Comment: I purchased this because I wanted a quick and easy way to project movies whether it was outside or inside and it completely delivers on that front. Battery is good for 4-5 hours, has its own operating system so I can just access streaming functions the same as I would on a smart TV. The picture quality and brightness is great considering this thing is smaller than a coke can, no it isn't 4K but it's also a fraction of the price of a cinema quality projector. The remote control isn't needed, a lot of the apps only function after you've downloaded the Nebula app on your smartphone and once you've done that you don't need the remote anymore.

Title: OBSESSED!
Comment: Yes, it is expensive. But you are going to spend a similar amount with a cheaper one once you get it up and running with all the cables you need. This comes with Netflix, Hulu, Amazon, HBO, all of it! And it works independently of your phone. I love it! I travel with it everywhere now.

Title: Great theater-in-pocket
Comment: Great projector. Much better than the newer version.Remote mobile app is bad.. always disconnecting. Needs an upgrade.In my opinion Anker failed on the new version in relation battery life and price comparison.This version is much better.

Title: Great support in addition to a solid product (HBOGO works)
Comment: I'm not gonna comment on the picture and sound quality. There are plenty of reviews about that and I am satisfied with it. I use it watching movie/shows on the bedroom ceiling. It works great! Besides that, I like the tech support behind it. They will reply once every day regardless of weekends/holiday.The original OS comes with it does not have the google app store and I can't find a working HBOGO app. Using the downloaded apk file I can install the app but it won't run without the google app store. Eventually, I emailed them about the issue and they sent me a beta version OS with a full-blown android system that support HBOGO (version 18.1.0.11). Contact them if you have a similar problem.

Title: THE BESTEST PORTABLE PROJECTOR
Comment: This one of the BESTEST portable projector in market, you definitely not disappointed with this product my family love it. It's like portable smart TV  because can do anything like smart TV in the market right now. YOU MUST HAVE IT!!!BTW.. both Anker and Amazon customer service top the notch, they will help you with any problem and quick service. Thank you Anker

Title: Great things do come in tiny packages!
Comment: Such a fun projector! My family used it to screen movies on the lawn and even without a screen the picture quality was great. Speaker option is loud and clear. I haven’t tried to Max out the volume yet but so far so good. I’m really impressed by this little machine (literally smaller than a soda can).

Title: Great moments
Comment: Amazing product, very convenient for my gym time. I have use it during the day and the image is very good. The sound not so great but you can always connect to a speaker or headphones for better quality. Also very good size for the projection. Still didn't tried the apps but so far love it

Title: Works well in super dark room.
Comment: Very small and portable. Can take it anywhere any room without dealing with a lot of cables and devices. Love it’s 4 hour battery life, good for about 2 movies. Works well in super dark room.

Title: I can't say enough about this. I love it
Comment: I absoluty love this! We use this indoors and outdoors. Great on our Gage door for movie nights in the summer. I even used this on a shoe box on my desk indoor, when it's too bright outside during the day for the wall. I can't say enough about this. I wish I didn't buy my big Tv's. I would use this everyday.

Title: Lots of bang for your buck!
Comment: This product was recommended by a friend. I love how small and easy this is to set up. I love the projector!!! Great quality as well! I did have an issue with the hardware. I called the manufacturer. They had excellent customer service. I would recommend the amazon extended warranty just in case there is an issue after 1 year.

Title: Works fantastic!!!
Comment: Love this for our camper van! Even in the daytime we get a bright clear image. Screen mirroring resolves any issues about what you can watch off your phone.

Title: Great picture quality
Comment: The quality of the picture is amazing. The sound is good quality too. We watch movies every weekend outside and have no problem hearing it over traffic and background noise.

Title: Built like a tank
Comment: This projector is extremely durable. My 4 young children unfortunately  have gotten ahold of it enough times where if it were any other projector, it be shattered into a million pieces. This thing gets used and abused and still works like new.

Title: Affordable, portable, easy setup projector.
Comment: Awesome product. Makes outdoor movie setup a snap. Needs to be pretty dark to see best, but as I expected from a small projector. We used with movie screen from Amazon. I can say how impressed I am with this little projector.  Netflix, Hulu right on it, plus I can plug into it with my MacBook as well.  Great for the money. Highly recommend.

Title: Big projector in a small container!
Comment: This projector is awesome for its size.  Easy to use.  I got it so I could project movies onto the ceiling and watch from bed.  I bought a tiny tripod to mount it on. The picture is awesome especially in the dark.  Sound is pretty good too but limited by the size.  You can cannot to alternate speakers or headphones by Bluetooth.  The portability is fantastic.  Battery is good for just a little longer than a regular length movie but for the size and quality that’s an acceptable sacrifice.

Title: Great projector
Comment: This is by far the best on the market. Speaker is great and video quality is very good! The only downside is that it could be brighter. I know the newer model has 2X the brightness but it’s also a lot more expensive.

Title: Better than expected
Comment: So much better than expected. The android App Store doesn’t work well but customer service was fantastic and upgraded to google play store which has everything. Like having a built in chrome cast!  It’s bright enough to was ina dim room daytime doesn’t have to be completely dark.  So much better than I hoped for.

Title: Super awesome mini smart projector buy it now
Comment: Awesome device it's the size of a soda can, solid construction,no need for anything to connect except wifi, screen mirroring,it can be a projector or a bluetooth speaker in projection mode you can hook up other bluetooth devices to it but the 360° speaker on it sounds good enough for any situation if portability is a must then this is your solution it has netflix,hulu,spotify and YouTube  on its app store all work fine for the price you can't find a better mini projector with as many clutch features buy it a tripod and case and you are golden if you're in it for resolution this won't wow you but everything else will

Title: WOW, this is cool!!!
Comment: Really cool item and functionality is tremendous. Was very easy to setup and operate. Both remote and app on phone control it, can use phone as hot spot and still cast. Throws a BIG picture up that is really clean. I purchased this item to use as a way to show a marketing/promotional video of my company during meetings. The device itself is a conversation piece that helps flow the conversation towards our capabilities and unique approach to everything we do...used it at a friends to watch youtube videos on his garage door, all wireless. The pic and sound are powerful for this little guy. I looked at a lot of these mini-projectors, went to the local electronics stores, and hands down this beauty blew em all away. Highly recommended for home or business use.

Title: Great product!
Comment: I had a problem with my Nebula Capsule and Daisy was quick to help!  Kudos to you and very thankful for this little gadget!I like it because of its portability.  I've used it plenty of times and just projecting on the ceilings and walls of my apartment.  This has a very booming sound so no need of external speakers, although you can add one.  Only minor gripe is there is only one slot for charging, and there are no other slots so you're out of luck if you wanted to attach your flash drive, etc.  Otherwise, I love it for what it does!

Title: fantasticoverall
Comment: love it in general.  the phone app is really lacking and is a bit wonky for set up.  it seems to have an incredibly difficult time connecting to the device (I have excellent wifi so know that's not the issue).  picture is great, sound is great and I love the built in Netflix and Amazon Prime apps (as well as others); makes watching movies so easy.

Title: Good projector!
Comment: I have spent monies on projectors for my video Djing jobs, but this is very convenient. I also use it to show Netflix and other apps that are built in with my friends and family. Great buy!

Title: Unbelievably small, loud and good picture.
Comment: This is a great little projector. Perfect for my personal use. Visible and usable during the day, but don’t expect any miracles. Perfect at night. Good picture quality, good speakers! It’s shockingly small. All around excited to use it!!!CALL ANKER TO UPDATE THE ANDROID VERSION. Many YouTube reviews and others mention that it only has the old aptoide, this is no longer true. or if you are tech savvy check out Reddit for a new GMS code.

Title: Ease of use and great picture quality
Comment: Gift for my teen granddaughter. Picture quality excellent as is ease of use. She’s used her bedroom ceiling along with the inside of a tent for viewing along with the more common wall as a screen. Great, fun product!

Title: Super portable projector with great customer service
Comment: Things I like:-Cheap-Four hour battery life-Super portable without the need to carry all the wires-Ability to project phone / MacBook screens to it directly-Built-in Android OS with many apps to download-Super responsive and fantastic customer service support!Things I don't like:-using micro-USB to charge is a bit out of date, would be nice to have USB-C-100 ANSI lumen isn't very bright-480p is pretty low resolution but can't complain at its price-FPS is low when watching videos

Title: Solid Picture and Audio Quality
Comment: This was my choice after reviewing several other similar products.  I purchased two options, and the Nebula easily won out.  For not being HD, the picture quality is better than expected.  Ultimately I got this for my daughter to use in her dorm and take out and about.  She aims it at the ceiling, which works well too.  The audio is solid for being the smaller size.  Been happy with all of my Anker products that I’ve purchased over the years.

Title: I love it!
Comment: I just unboxed and so far I love everything about this purchase. As you can see it’s literally the size of a can. I don’t have a screen yet so the picture is understandable. I love that it has Onboarding sound if you feel like the actual projector isn’t enough. I bout this for outdoor movies during the summer. I have two speakers that link to each other so this is definitely a great buy. Would do it all over again.

Title: Love it
Comment: Really enjoy this device. Had a rough start getting the apps to run smooth but after troubleshooting with tech support, it runs beautifully. Well worth the price tag.

Title: Great Portable Projector👍💯👍
Comment: For the price i paid i will say it is a great project and by Anker...the picture quality is awesome and i use it for my nintendo switch on the go👍👍it came with a remote and a travel pouch which i like👍💯👍no damage and in great condition💯👍💯 I use it for movies and games i cannot lie this projector is badass great job Amazon and Anker💯💯💯

Title: Anker does it again!
Comment: Anker...  Man..  This brand has become, MY brand..  I own everything they make..  From charger bricks to cables, to screen protectors...  Even their vacuum....  And now the Nebula..  Screen quality is incredible...  Size..  Shockingly small.  (It really is coke can sized.)So excited for backyard night football games this fall!

Title: Pretty awesome
Comment: We use this for my son, who has a vision impairment, and the portability gives us a lot of flexibility. No complaints about the picture or sound. It's easy to set up, and very simple to stream from YouTube or use another device by way of the HDMI port. I haven't downloaded any other apps so I can't speak to them, but it's a great little projector for us.Initially I had problems getting this to hold a charge, but that issue went away when I used the charger that came with it. Just make sure you use the recommended charger, otherwise it will take forever.I was going to give it four stars, but the customer service was superb so that bumps it up.

Title: Easy set up and easy to use
Comment: Simple set up and very easy to use.  Looks good and for a portable projector it is amazing.  Can't wait to use it for Halloween.  The battery cover on the remote broke when I pulled the plastic battery cover tab and Anker quickly sent me a replacement.  Great customer service.

Title: Great little projector!
Comment: I love the portability of this little thing.  It fits my needs and so far it's been accurate on it's description. What I love the most is their customer service! it's hazel-free and their people are very professional. Specially Ada who helps me to update my device so I can run Google Play and all Google Apps needed for my projector to function like a regular android device. I have always trusted Anker and their products!

Title: Worth every penny
Comment: This is an amazing little projector! I read reviews that you couldn’t stream from this so I bought a connector; but we were able to screen mirror and stream no problem. Has amazing picture and sound quality, lasts for hours, doesn’t get hot.

Title: Great little portable projector
Comment: Connected laptop to HDMI port on projector to watch movies outdoors. Amazing sound and picture from size of a coke can. Does not need to be completely dark outside to work. Good battery life.

Title: We are about to project into each in dark hotel room nicely. Kids use in their room with friends over
Comment: Not the brightest but does the trick. We travel with it and a travel router. We are about to project into each in dark hotel room nicely. Kids use in their room with friends over. Works well with Netflix and Amazon video apps.

Title: Worth It
Comment: Product: Well built, definitely compact, speaker sound excellent, and image quality is clear (even in less than ideal light conditions). Ideal for me as I watch nearly all my media through the major streaming apps and have no intention of purchasing a television. Purchased the Nebula tripod to enable optimal viewing angles in my room.Customer Service: I actually rarely write reviews and was motivated by the fantastic customer service provided by Anker. I noticed a price reduction shortly after I made the purchased, contacted Anker, and they promptly answered and issued a refund for the difference. I also was impressed with their persistent follow-up on product satisfaction.Summary: Excellent portable projector that fulfills my needs. Tack on the outstanding customer service, the Nebula Capsule is worth the money.

Title: You will not be disappointed.
Comment: I was really impressed with the picture quality and sound. It was very easy to set up. I rather plug in the Roku stick than use the App Store. It’s just easier to navigate. To use the remote you have to point directly at the can. I watched and read reviews for 2 weeks. You will not be disappointed.

Title: Outdoor Movie Night!
Comment: I love this projector! I have had two outdoor movie nights with my 80 yo mom during this pandemic. It is something we will keep up until it gets too cold to sit outside. It has brought us some fun during a very stressful time.It is easy to use. I love that I can connect it to my iPhone and that it is rechargeable. We put the screen up on the fence and don’t need to worry about running an extension cord.

Title: Great quality small sized projector!
Comment: Ive had this for a little over a year now and absolutely love it. Picture and sound quality is great. This projector's small size makes it super convenient to use. I also really like the app that lets me control it from my phone. Support for this is also excellent, I had a question once and they were super prompt and helpful getting back to me. One down side of the nebula capsule is it's battery life which is a little short. Overall I would definitely recommend getting this.

Title: Awesome little device
Comment: I got this as a Christmas gift for my husband and he loves it. Picture was better than expected. Could be a bit louder for sound but we love it. Plus gets him to go to the man cave. I'd pay double for that alone

Title: Good product
Comment: I've had this for about a year now, and I'm really happy with it.- it's really quiet- picture quality is good- brightness is good (you can't use it in daylight obviously)- nice designThings that can improve:- Better audio quality OR audio output jack (to connect to an amplifier)- Adding ability to make projection smaller/larger

Title: The kids love being able to watch TV in any room
Comment: Wife complained about me buying it.  But now she uses it more than I do.  The kids love being able to watch TV in any room.  It is a small projector but the quality of the image is way better than I was expecting.  Obviously the darker the room the better the picture.

Title: Another great Anker product.
Comment: Love my Nebula Capsule. It is so much better than my older Sony pico projector. The Capsule will go in my travel bag and be with me where I go.Works great with my iPhone and iPads. And I love that it works well as a stand-alone device. My only two wishes would be that it supported ExFat instead of Fat32. And I wish it had a dedicated charging port instead of a shared use port. Not having these do not detract from all the other positives.I own just about every product Anker sells (chargers, lamps, Eufy vacuums, cables). They have great customer service and quality products.

Title: my kids love the novelty of our own home movie theater
Comment: This is pretty easy to use with streaming video services.  Coupled with (for example) Netflix, you have a movie theater wherever.  Somehow, this makes it more special than watching things on TV.

Title: Excellent Product
Comment: This is really an excellent product that simply works as advertised.  It’s perfect for travel and easy to setup (would definitely recommend using a standard tripod which adds even more flexibility).  In addition, the new firmware adds Google Play functionality which allows you to stream directly from the store. Pretty cool. Keep in mind that the resolution isn’t HD. But it really isn’t missed when viewing at a distance.Overall highly recommended!

Title: Yes!
Comment: Love it!!! Works great! Picture is great! Sound is good. It has a lot of apps (Hulu Netflix) all the popular ones already ready.  I prefer my phone as the remote as if you use the remote it has to be directly pointed at the projector or it’s doesn’t work. Works great!

Title: Great value
Comment: For the price, this is a great device loaded with features including ability to download movies and project directly from Netflix without phone, wires etc. Sounds is very good. Would be good if it was possible to brighten the picture but it is very good value for the money

Title: Great product!
Comment: We are all loving the Nebula Capsule!  The main complaint in our household is that we need more than one as it is truly a portable TV (better than a TV in many ways).  We took it on our winter break vacation and when we needed some downtime we projected movies and watched them together.  The sound is great, the picture quality is really pretty good even on a dark brown wall (which surprised us all).  We just purchased a stand to make it easier to project it where we want for it to be... it is really awesome.  I wasn't sure about this purchase, but it surpassed my expectations.

Title: Great mini projector
Comment: Bought this for use in camper and on boat. Have been pleased with picture quality and battery life so far. It was very easy to set up and load in all of my streaming apps. Allows downloading videos for offline use which is great for camping.

Title: Can't adjust brightness
Comment: For some reason, I can’t increase the brightness.  It's truly a pain in the butt.

Title: Big things come in small packages!
Comment: Absolutely love this projector. The size for the clarity and brightness, ease & convenience is amazing. It’s silent, I can’t hear a cooling fan at all. Can’t wait to take it out camping for outdoor movie nights or out by the pool or hot tub.

Title: Dope
Comment: This projector is really good and I like the fact it worked perfectly on IOS and Android. Picture quality is super and sound is also good from built in speaker.

Title: Works as expected!
Comment: I was thinking to give it a 4 stars because it does not have a micro SD and the Miracast did not work for me (but I spend about 1min trying to get it to work) but... It hitted the spot on what is important to me!  Dream come true, I can now watch movies and shows on my bedroom ceiling, comfortably. I did have other portable projectors, some are even smaller than this one, but this one is better in any parameter.Image quality:Amazing for the size, although not HD, the image looks nice and bright.Remote:Did not use it once... Using the app and happy.Speaker:Laud, clear and good for watching in bed with the wife. Other projectors speakers are really, really bad.Bluetooth:My airpods are connecting to this one and stay connected when I want to watch silently. I had issues with other projectors.Plex+netflix:Works perfectly.Opera:Works as expected when streaming content.Stand:I have tripod and a screen, but... I did not use them once with this one.When watching in bed, the box that nebula Capsule came with is a great , adjustable stand to watch on the ceiling.When watching in the living room, just placed it on the coffee table and everything was good.Battery:Did not test it, but it is lasting much longer than other portable projectors. I did not need to charge it once when watching around 3 hours of content.Feb-28 Update:Extremely happy...

Title: Nice.
Comment: This was a good deal however I didn't know there was a newer model until after I ordered this one.

Title: Broke a month in, but ran great prior
Comment: Worked great for a month, then out of nowhere it wouldn't turn on. They are sending a replacement so hopefully it stays up and running because the pucture and video quality is superb

Title: Good for movie night but not good enough for presentations.
Comment: This mini Projector is soo good for a movie night. But If you are buying it for PowerPoint preseantations, then it will be a lil difficult for you because its not very bright. You need a good amount of darkness in room to see the image clearlyI will give it 10/10 marks for its battery timing.

Title: Amazing!
Comment: Super easy to set up, wonderful picture quality!  We bought as a gift for the entire family and are really enjoying it!  Download the Nebula app and go from there!! A great product!

Title: A Little Wonder
Comment: I love this little wonder...The Nebula capsule is so compact and easy to setup, it’s almost like carrying a multi-media powerstation in my back pocket. I also purchased a Hermitshell case which is perfect companion. The picture is superb with this little fella, but it does need to be pretty dark. I use it outside on my patio, but torches or decorative lights cause distortion. Overall I’m very pleased!

Title: Superior quality for the price!
Comment: The Capsule is an excellent product all around.  Affordable price and great picture quality! Initially ran into some issues with running Xfinity Stream but after a quick call with Anker CS this little projector is perfect.  For the remote it’s very convenient but download the app which is much more efficient.

Title: Good value and actually has enough battery capacity to watch a full movie!
Comment: It's not very bright though.  Use it at Home with blah results.... Use it while traveling, camping, or the like and it's pretty awesome!

Title: Great for parties or small gatherings with friends
Comment: It's very easy to use, but much better once you apply to test the device's Play Services capabilities. The Nebula itself is an amazing little piece of tech that I hope to see improve again and again with each iteration.

Title: Overall Great Product
Comment: I had some issues with the initial connecting to my home network. Projector apparently was rejecting all of my tries to connect to my WiFi. Don't know the reasons. But I solved the problem by connecting to the phone as a personal hotspot first, then reset all the settings and only after that this lil fella connected to the home network. Hope this feedback will help anyone with the same troubles.Overall, the projector is splendid. Love it!

Title: Excellent product better than expected
Comment: I’ve been using the projector for about 3 months. It’s great !!! Very good quality. My kids love it. And for work it’s amazing.The app for smartphone work awesome

Title: Away from home dream
Comment: Currently out of country and this is perfect for the room I'm in. Not to be used for gaming. Otherwise who needs a tv when you have this and Netflix.

Title: Great little projector
Comment: This is a fantastic little projector.  i do presentations for work and wanted something smaller and more portable than the projectors my office had.  This projector works fantastic.  It isn't super bright, but most of the time the room is dark enough that it works out.  I've even used it at home to watch movies with the kids through the Netflix app.  They enjoyed that part of it.

Title: Awesome!!!
Comment: Where to start?! This thing is amazing! My husband and I wanted something to project movies for us on camping trips, and this will be perfect! We’re apready using it at home! The picture is wonderful for the price of the device! It’s clear, but also a little grainy at times, but I think that’s cool. It give it a vintage movie feel! I would absolutely recommend this! I downloaded the app and had YouTube and Netflix up and running in no time, directly from my iPhone!! It’s convienient and wonderful! Definitely a fun gadget to take movie night to the next level!!

Title: Worked great!!
Comment: I was surprised on how well this worked.  I took it on a week long rustic cabin trip for some nightly entertainment.  It let me download 4 movies from Netflix for the trip.

Title: Plex capable portable projector is a hit
Comment: Great little portable projector. This lacks brightness but I knew that before purchasing. I didn’t expect it to be theater grade. The apps available are fantastic and I can run plex without issue.

Title: Love my projector
Comment: Love how portable it is. The remote is kinda worthless since it doesn’t work with most apps requiring you to use the app remote.

Title: Movies in a can
Comment: For what it is this thing is awesome! Sure it's not 4k and a bazillion lumens, but for the price, for the size and portability this thing is awesome. Oh yeah, the built in app store is lame, until you get it jail broken or whatever you wanna call it, it kinda sucks. Still 5 stars and great response time from customer service.

Title: Worth every penny
Comment: This is a great projector that is easy to use. I purchased for home use but immediately bought some for my work as well. The picture quality and sound is excellent.

Title: Just what we been missing
Comment: This is the thing we been missing in are back patio / bar area. Easy to use, speaker not bad but had a Bluetooth speaker in hand. Just a recommendation go right in to the settings and update the software before downloading and apps. But overall happy with the product.

Title: Amazing quality
Comment: I’m beyond happy with this projector! The clarity in unreal. Our family gets to enjoy movie night’s in our backyard or camping and we couldn’t be happier with it. My 3 siblings all ordered one for their kids after seeing how cool our outdoor movies nights were. Highly recommend!

Title: Great little projector
Comment: I had my doubts about this little projector but it did not disappoint! I have used it a number of times and I've been working impressed with the ease of use and the quality of the picture.

Title: Great product, unfortunately
Comment: Great product, unfortunately, like many of the small projectors, the unit fails to focus on the corners and the center at the same time.

Title: wonderful!
Comment: Love it!!!!!!!! We watch movies while having a camp fire. it's great for the kids. During this pandemic it's hard be able to be safe and still have fun. This projector allows my daughter to social distance and still have her friends over for a movie. Great product!

Title: Fun device
Comment: I got this for my daughter who is not allowed to have a TV in her bedroom. She loved it . Picture quality beat all expectations.  Super easy set up. Fun gagit to have .

Title: Easy to use
Comment: Easy set up and great picture. Love that it is so easy to move anywhere.

Title: This is perfect for nighttime backyard movie
Comment: Wow!!I truly believe this tiny capsule is magic. Are there some slight compromises? Sure! But, all there is to know about it, is that this device lives up to expectations. Actually it exceeds! Obviously this will not replace you TV or your extra expensive projector. This is perfect for nighttime backyard movie, or if you are an avid camper. Performs very well without glitches. Awesome for movies outdoor. Absolutely love it!

Title: Great little projector
Comment: Great little projector and the speaker is surprisingly loud.Picture quality is great as long as it is not in direct light.The app is a little confusing and some apps in the app store do not appear to have been updated in awhile but not a huge issue.Also works with wireless Samsung Dex.

Title: Better than expected
Comment: I saw several reviews before buying it and still have doubts, however, I've decided to buy to try myself and it was a great surprise! the size is perfect and you can carry anywhere you want. I already connect consoles and use mirroring from my iPad to see my favorite movies, (the low resolution mentioned in others reviews is imperceptible in the right distance) sound in speaker mode match perfectly for uses in BBQs with my family.  also, the doubts I got with the software were perfectly answered by customer service.  recommended!

Title: Good projector for the price.
Comment: I like this projector a lot. I love that it’s compact and portable. The only thing that’s kind of annoying is that not all apps on it are compatible with the remote control provided so you have to get an app on your smartphone to use that app on the projector. All in all I’m happy with the product though.

Title: Great picture & sound!
Comment: We LOVE this and use it outside weekly--though a projection screen would do better, we screen it right on our fence and the picture is still clear.  Only down side is that the remote is a little finicky and you often need to use the phone app instead.

Title: Very good for small venue
Comment: Very good quality and works well for a small venue as the larger the picture the quality goes down , traveling case nice but does not hold all the important items, actually the box that it comes in is great to hold the device and transport

Title: One bad Mofo
Comment: We have two of these gadgets, they are absolutely awesome. Just buy it already, you won't be disappointed.

Title: Love this and can't wait to use it outdoors in ...
Comment: This is one of the coolest little projectors I have ever seen.  Bought on Amazon on Cyber Monday and it was worth every penny.  The clarity of the picture is impressive and the sound it produces is crystal clear.  Love this and can't wait to use it outdoors in the summer!

Title: Awesome
Comment: I love almost everything about this projector. The picture is clear. Sound is all around loud. The size of the projector is surprisingly small. The only thing I do not like is the lack of response from the remote control. I hate that I had to download an app to use as a remote.

Title: Easy setup and perfect picture quality
Comment: I love this projector. The Installation process was very easy, it connected perfectly with my WLAN and I was able to download the Hulu App to watch my shows. In addition I can plug in my Amazon Firestick. It took me a while to understand the remote control App, but now I can use it as well. The picture quality is great in combination with a projector screen. I definitely recommend this projector for outdoor movie nights (on the rooftop).

Title: What a surprise!
Comment: Great compact projector, at an excellent price (Lightning Deal). I can't believe how bright this is, don't let anyone look into the light, too bright!  Another great Anker product!

Title: Very portable and versatile.
Comment: This is awesome.  We have watched movies outdoors and in rooms with no electricity.  Video is adjustable and can be sharpened.  Its the size of a soda can so I can take it anywhere. I wish it would have had instructions, however, but they are available online.

Title: Would buy 10 more if we needed them!
Comment: Purchased as a gift and could not be more happy!!! Great sound,  great picture... took some time to set up but totally worth it.  We use it outside while in the pool or hot tub against the fence.

Title: Good product
Comment: Very nice but expensive, quality good but add 50 bucks extra and buy apollo , it's much better but this is not bad also.

Title: Go for it
Comment: I really enjoy watching Netflix/ YouTube amazing sound effects/ screen is very clear , easy to download they system

Title: Love Love Love
Comment: I really like this product. The only issue I had was the battery to the remote. There was a film around the battery and you have to place the battery between the two metal prongs. The directions were not clear on this. Once customer support wrote me back the remote worked. This small piece of work is EXCELLENT!

Title: Nice little projector!
Comment: This is the perfect on the go projector! With the built in apps it's a one shot solution! It's pretty bright and the colors are really vibrant, the audio is also surprisingly loud and clear considering you can literally put this thing in your pocket! This is perfect for camping, traveling, etc. If you're on the fence... Just get it! You won't regret it!

Title: Really nice for the size
Comment: Ive used it for a bit, sometimes I get amazed for what it does, sometimes its a bit load the fan but when you put more than 1/2 volume you dont hear it, really nize and the size its amazing.

Title: Great buy. I suggest you try it.
Comment: The best portable projector I've tried so far.

Title: Que se respetó lo ofertado y el producto entregado
Comment: Exelente, la calidad de imagen y lo práctico para, llevar y disfrutar en cualquier lado, lo único criticable es que no se puede cargar y ver por sistema USB  al mismo tiempo

Title: A good product I would recommend
Comment: Got recommended by some friend when I looked for a projector.I really like it so far after having it for 3 days:) The package looks fancy to me, and it should be very convenient to take for travel.The picture quality is nice. I would say, definitely has room to improve the picture quality but consider the price it is really exceed my expectation! The sound and battery are also performing well.The pre installed apps are convenient too, with mobile controller it is easy to operate. So far I mainly used it for YouTube and Netflix.

Title: The best.
Comment: This is a terrific item.  The picture is so clear. Love it.

Title: Easy set up and great sound and picture.
Comment: I bought this for my sons dorm room and tried it out....totally mistake....now I want one! This thing is amazing!  Connects easily to phone and the picture and sound are incredible considering how small and portable it is.  I looked at several others and purchased one and returned it because too many cords to deal with. If your looking for a portable projector this is the one to get!

Title: Not only did she walk me through the setup (which turned out to be very easy) but she stayed on the phone with me until I was physically using the product watching Netflix and it works fantastic. Not only will I recommend the product but ...
Comment: When I first opened it I had trouble getting things started and was all flustered and then I contacted the help line and they answered within less than one minute.  I spoke with Ashley who was aaaaaaaaammmmmmmmmmmazzzzzzzzzzzzzzzingly helpful.  Not only did she walk me through the setup (which turned out to be very easy) but she stayed on the phone with me until I was physically using the product watching Netflix and it works fantastic.  Not only will I recommend the product but I'm also purchasing another one for my dad for fathers day.  Thanks you Ashley for helping me, I love the product.

Title: Amazing projector
Comment: Love love love the projector picture it’s great quality and is incredibly easy to use and travel with

Title: Wonderful device
Comment: Bought it as a Christmas present for my 18 year old who loves it! The multiple inputs hdmi, Bluetooth, usb allow him to use multiple devices and he has been using it to play on his Xbox in bed! Video quality is average but ok for playing games and even watching Netflix in bed

Title: Works great
Comment: Very nice projector for the money.

Title: Buen Producto
Comment: Buena Calidad

Title: Great for the size
Comment: This thing works amazing for how small it is I love it

Title: Awsome
Comment: Excellent product great clear picture and has a pretty good speaker system built in. Very happy with this buy

Title: Great product...Great Customer Support
Comment: I bought this device for work. Ability to project in meetings where audio visual systems always seem to fail. I had some questions about enabling certain capabilities of the application and was connected with Ashley. She stepped me through what I needed in an efficient and professional way.Picture is great. Sound is great. Form factor is great. Replaces my bluetooth speaker as well.I love this device. It's a mobile entertainment system for work and play.

Title: A Great Surprise
Comment: Gave this as a birthday gift. The receiver, his family and their neighbor loves it. It took movie night with the kids to a new level.

Title: Work great in Afghanistan!!
Comment: I've been using this projector everyday in Afghanistan while deployed. It has been outstanding the picture is good and the sound is great. However the remote stopped working, and I'm a little worried about replacing the lamp in the future. But by far th best little projector on the market.

Title: Excellent Product
Comment: Picture is good, but the remote stop working, and I have change the battery twice

Title: This little guy is awesome! He does the job of a larger projector ...
Comment: This little guy is awesome! He does the job of a larger projector I did not expect the viewing image I received. That just shows you can judge a book by Its cover

Title: Almost perfect
Comment: Great designing, hardware is perfect. Software can be better, but it’s acceptable. I can control it with iPhone or remote , pretty easy. Love it so much.

Title: Me gustó mucho
Comment: Para ser portable y de este tamaño, es excelente en su calidad de imagen.

Title: Easy to setup and Fantastic Picture and Sound
Comment: I was looking for a small projector to use for lunch and learn meetings for work and this absolutely fit the bill.  It is better than running off my laptop  and easy to use anywhere.  You cannot image how much easier this made my job.  Not to mention my 5 year old thought it was so cool we could have a TV anywhere in the house.Very pleased and happy with the customer service follow up.

Title: quality
Comment: We use this product for remote movies for trips, parties, etc.

Title: awesome for the price.
Comment: this has a beautiful picture, super quiet and very easy to use, highly recommend this projector.

Title: Awesome
Comment: Great for family activities

Title: Great Quality for so small device
Theater type device
Comment: This is a really cool device. I was hoping for more functionality when I bought it, but it plays streaming movies and shows well. You need to make sure the room is dark for the best picture quality and i can’t figure out how to display presentations from my laptop on it as I was hoping, but the picture quality isn’t good enough to use it in a work meeting anyways.

Title: Incorporated OS
Comment: Better than expected, with the incorporated OS you can stream directly from Wifi. Also the way it auto adjusts to the angle its great

Title: Great portable projector, good price point, worth it!!
Comment: This is a great portable projector.  Super easy to set up and great quality picture. The speaker is really good as well.  There is an app that you can download to your phone to control the projector and it comes with a remote as well, both work really well.  Can’t say enough good things about this little powerhouse.

Title: Worth the money
Comment: Like:1. Easy to use.2. Can use from phone or computer.3. Works with both Android and iPhone.4. Good quality. Don't expect a $1000 projector quality from this one.5. Light weight, easy to carry.6. Good for Indoor and Outdoor, instant use.Dislike:1. Will update my review as soon as i find one.

Title: Good but needs tweaks!
Comment: Could be brighter and more clear. Also doesn’t get all the apps you think and it won’t screen mirror curtain apps on your phone. For a small portable projector it’s is awesome. I’m sure they will come out with a better version.

Title: Fantastic portable projector
Comment: Absolutely love this device!  Totally blown away by its picture quality and sound based on its size.  Have really surprised a few guests as well. The menus are easy to navigate; easy to set up and use as well.  Anker Support was great too!  I emailed them through their web site with a couple of questions (not issues), and received immediate and very helpful response.  Highly recommend this device!  A few of my friends have now bought one as well.

Title: The must have camping gadget.
Comment: We love the capsule. Perfect for movie night. Picture quality is amazing. Easy to use and fun! Pairs right to my phones hotspot and we connect ours to the Anker sound core Neo and it’s like being at the movies.

Title: Best gift this Christmas
Comment: I wasn't sure what to expect.  The quality of the movies we have watched were awesome.  We used it on the bedroom wall and WOW!!!

Title: Soda Can Movies!
Comment: Perfect product for these times! The sound is great! Movie experience in a size of a soda can. Its built portable, robust and simple.

Title: Muy satisfecho con la compra.
Comment: Una de las mejores compras que he hecho en Amazon.

Title: Amazing
Comment: Portable, crisp picture, excellent sound. Unbelievable.

Title: Home Movies:)
Comment: I love this!! I got It for my fiancée for Christmas... It is great!!! Only negative thing I can say is the remote does not turn the device on.

Title: Worth the price!
Comment: I’m very happy with my projector ! Now I don’t want to get out of my house !!!easy to setup , amazing quality!

Title: Satisfied
Comment: Works great, sound is loud, picture is good. Customer service for beta update was prompt and responsive. Gave me a complimentary case too!

Title: Great Performance + Great Service = Fantastic Capsule
Comment: The Capsule is a fantastic travel entertainment companion. The projection and sound is amazing. It allows you to use the most popular apps. And with the Capsule case, you can take it everywhere and anytime. The customer service is even better - I felt I had a sound issue and they exchanged it out immediately. And they followed up with me about the new one to ensure that the new one is performing to my satisfaction. And it is! Great service makes the Capsule a must have.

Title: Awesome product
Comment: Awesome, highly recommend it！Great picture coming out of such a small device, I can play movies with Netflix, Youtube, even amazon prime video. The control APP is also perfect, the mouse mode used like laptop’s touch pad, it’s the same experience, and i like it vey much.This night my family spend more than 3 hours with this little projector, two movies, without charging! That's amazing, the voice can be heard in the whole room, my wife and son are vey happy with it.

Title: Nice projector with great picture
Comment: I have used a lot of projectors, in classrooms, in conference rooms, in consumer's offices. I don't expect this projector to be as bright as the one in the classroom. After all, projector is a power device, more brightness means more power consumption and heat. But this projector's brightness and picture exceed my expectations and can be described as great. I can carry it conveniently, project the picture anywhere I want, presentation, and watching movies. It is very satisfying, and the sound and battery are also great.

Title: Makes everything so easy
Comment: The self adjust projection is very handy I can almost project from any angle and it mostly came out like a porpotionaly correct

Title: ANKER CUSTOMER SERVICE
Comment: This company's customer service is outstanding. If you need help or replacement parts for your equipment please email them. They took very good care of me after my dog ate the remote to my Nebula Capsule. They were fast, polite, and very easy to communicate with. Plus my husband and I do love the Capsule. We use it for all our "Netflix & Chill" necessities. Definitely recommended.

Title: Muy bueno
Comment: Excelente producto, muy recomendado, puede ver Netflix e incluso descargar películas para verlas Offline, el único problema es que solo tiene 8gb de memoria interna y no tiñe slot para micro sd

Title: Wow - Great Projector
Comment: I'm shocked at how bright - big and small - and how crystal clear this is.  So compact and easy to travel with.  Battery lasts well.  What a fun projector!

Title: Great
Comment: Lumens are ok, portability is awesome... sacrifices lumens for portability... it’s great for kids and camping or enjoying a movie ate the beach

Title: lo mejor
Comment: aun trabaja a la perfecion

Title: Great sound and resolution
Comment: Great sound and resolution. Remote control is included, but most of control when playing Netflix or you tube is done from the phone after uploading a specific app.

Title: What a wonderful device. Now we can watch movies anywhere around ...
Comment: What a wonderful device.  Now we can watch movies anywhere around the house, assuming you have WiFi.  You can download movies on Netfix and watch if you have no WiFi.All around great product and would highly recommend.

Title: Amazing projector
Comment: Best mini projector out there. I’ve tried several and this blows them away

Title: Great item!
Comment: Great projector for its price!Nothing negative that I can say about it.

Title: My little one loves it
Comment: So far so good. Don't know if it lasts long.I bought it for my little one to avoid her looking at the ipad or cell phone for cartoon.It is very portable. I can bring it travel.Last night I watched a movie with it. It is good. Of course, this won't be professional projector. But it is what i need!

Title: It’s awesome.
Comment: It is difficult to learn the platform but once you figure it out this thing is nice. Sound quality is great,  Only bad thing is that the design is small and heavy I bet one drop and it’s a goner. Definitely buy a tri pod with it. To have a sturdy base to hold it in place.

Title: Great image quality!
Comment: The product is excellent, it works very well, I am very happy with the purchase. Thank you

Title: Everything is working good for now!

Title: Excellent product, others I showed it too

Title: Amazing!!

Title: the best projector
Comment: It is just the best portable proyector ever!!!! Great picture, amazing sound no need to conect to other speaker, great bluetooth conection as speaker, adapts to the position the screen is

Title: It works great on a tripod
Comment: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this little projector! We are so pleased!!!!I would definitely recommend it to others.

Title: Perfect Christmas gift
Comment: We love this little projector. We have used it inside and out and the picture is great. What a fun way to watch football outside or movies on the ceiling g  Our grown children want them for their homes. Perfect Christmas gift.  Customer service is also very responsive when I had a question on adding content to the Nebula.

Title: Great and compact
Comment: My husband was very excited about this gift. Easy to transport and the picture is great:)

Title: Great little projector!
Comment: we love love this projector! it is easy to use and no wires!  we watch netflix movies all of the time in our backyard.  allowed my son to have a few friends over and they could social distance while watching a movie.

Title: Review en español
Comment: El proyector es excelente, la imagen es muy buena y el parlante que viene integrado cumple, las apps que vienen y se pueden instalar son las justas, no es compatible con el chromecast por aquello (me pareció raro porque tiene Android) y el ventilador no hace mucho ruido

Title: Great buy
Comment: Works great, picture and sound are exactly what i wanted.Use the app sooooo easy! Love it!

Title: My kids love it as I can throw it in any corner ...
Comment: The package is small and versatile. My kids love it as I can throw it in any corner of the house and keep them occupied. Moreover, Anker has SUPERIOR CUSTOMER SERVICE. They are quick and nimble at resolving any issues.

Title: Versatile and fun
Comment: This is a fun toy. We have a roof deck and thought it would be fun to be able to watch tv or a movie there. This projects a movie beautifully on our white stucco walls outside and makes tv throughout the house an option where a tv can’t easily be hung or wired.

Title: IT'S AMAZING
Comment: This projector is AMAZING. It's so portable, you can start a movie in your living room and finish it in your bedroom. Picture quality is great, the sound is solid, and the user interface is smart (YouTube app, Netflix app, etc. plus the ability to connect via HDMI or bluetooth). It's tiny, adorable, and so powerful.

Title: Fun device, great for families
Comment: I found this device on Deal of the Day for $249.00!  Quality is exceptional, battery last as long as I could expect and is exceptionally easy to set up.  Netflix, Amazon Video, You Tube all work great.The remote app is very helpful although as for IOS Apple devices I can not seem to mirror or stream directly from my phone, clearly a Android platform not playing nice with Apple.You will need to buy a Tri-Pod cause the  cylinder shape does not allow for tilting and easy adjustments on a flat surface but a $16 tripod solved all those issues.Sound is also as good as can be expected, have no complaints so don’t listen to those other reviews.Picture quality is exceptional even though we have only viewed so far on a wrinkly sheet that seems to work just fine for our satisfaction.Bottom line this is very easy to use, fun for the family and seems to be of high quality so if you want to experience outdoor movies made easy this is a must.

Title: The future is here and I am loving it!!
Comment: I rarely leave reviews, with that said this product is amazing. What truly sets it apart is the Android OS. This basically enhances this projector to limitless possibilities. The screen clarity is decent, of course as you make it larger it loses a bit of clarity. The bluetooth speaker is also good enough for a average size room. Yet you can bluetooth pair the unit to a larger speaker system and use it that way with Youtube/Pandora/Spotify in a party scenario. Back to the Android OS aspect. I Downloaded the Kodi app onto it and basically now can watch any movie or tv show ever made. I then connected it to my Google Chrome and mirrored my phone with the Sling tv app. That allows me to watch live tv on the projector. You can also do this via an Amazon FireTv/stick. I have it on my night stand projecting on my bedroom ceiling. You can mirror your phone and have the weather or whatever else constantly displaying. I then ran a Skype call while having my phone mirrored to it and had the other person staring back at me on my ceiling, which was very space odyssey 2001 haha. I am only getting started, what will you come up with?

Title: Very nice product.
Comment: Great product. Picture is reasonably bright - won't work well in a brightly lit room, but in dim lighting it's great. Focus control is sensitive, but when properly adjusted it's pretty even across the picture. Auto keystone works very well. App ecosystem is kinda strange and limited (no Hulu for example - WTH?), but with an HDMI port, AirPlay, and Miracast, it'll do anything you want. Ability to connect to an external Bluetooth speaker is tops. Capsule remote app works pretty well and even better since the very recent redesign. Recommend!

Title: Big sound and picture in little package
Comment: I've been genuinely impressed with this projector. We've had other set ups with far lower quality. It's a pain to move around a bulky projector, cords, and speakers with other "mobile" setups that you don't leave outside. This is the size of a pop can!As with anything small, you worry about sound quality, but this delivers a solid performance. Plenty loud (you'll almost never be asked to turn it down, though) for outdoor applications. Inside I'm sure it's even better.Video quality is far better than average as well. We had it maxed out on a 100 inch screen and the subtitles were easily readable.On top of all that, it's a slightly dated but easy to use (and most importantly working!) Version of Android. Not the play store, but you can get Amazon video, Netflix, and YouTube. And they all WORK.Battery life is solid at probably 3-4 hours, you'll never have a problem watching a full movie or two.Bundle all those five points together (portability, sound quality, video quality, software, battery) with a $350 price tag, and you have a no brainer purchase.I'd *highly* recommend the stand as well as an immediate addition.
